thread.title: Meyer a ‘raving lunatic’ as he addresses Ohio State’s fumble problems
thread.title_full: Meyer a ‘raving lunatic’ as he addresses Ohio State’s fumble problems

title: Meyer a ‘raving lunatic’ as he addresses Ohio State’s fumble problems
text:
Posted: 11:42 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 Meyer a ‘raving lunatic’ as he addresses Ohio State’s fumble problems Staff Writer COLUMBUS — 
Ohio State coach Urban Meyer described himself as a raving lunatic this week in practice as he worked to address the team’s fumble issues. 
Meyer repeatedly stressed to the players to keep the ball “high and tight.” The No. 1 Buckeyes (5-0) have put the ball on the ground 14 times and lost six fumbles. In the Big Ten, only Minnesota, with seven, has lost more. Continue Reading Read the complete story... The story you're reading is premium content available on our new premium website.
